i must admit, this is starting to make me miss my old job again, metal construction welder.. (bench worker / fitter, dunno exactly how you call it in english) its because i had an accident with an old machine almost lost a finger that made me lose the fire, but still, i was trying getting a job in metal without the machines but getting a job as a primitive blacksmith these days is very difficult in the netherlands, you always end up working in somekind of big or small factory working with the machines if you are a metal worker. but seeing you work Colin i really get the fire of building and welding back :D i would love to have a mig and start doing some stuff, still have to get one i guess to start with
